summary: A high-resolution & hand-crafted texture for teeth, tongue and gum.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][b]UPDATES[/b][/size][/center]

[list][*]Removed additional files made by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3136685/?]SvarogNL[/url]. There is now a seperate mod page for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56497/?]Immersive Version of Teeth Plus[/url] - go get it!
[/list]
[center][i]"A high-resolution & hand-crafted texture for teeth, tongue and gum."[/i][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/l4MsBEN.gif[/img][/center]

[center][size=3][b]FEATURES[/b][/size][/center]

[list][*]1024² texture resolution (512² option available)!
[*]high quality normal map with alot of depth!
[*]sharp and crisp transparency mask!
[*]easy to use Nexus Mod Manager compatible installer!
[/list][center][size=3][b]DOs & DON'Ts[/b][/size][/center]
As far as you dont install another texture replacer for the mouth texture you should be fine.

You should avoid these mods with [i]Teeth Plus[/i] installed:

[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33117/?]Realistic Teeth[/url]
[/list]Installing these mods will result in conflicts & unexpected results. THEY WILL NOT WORK TOGETHER!

[center][size=3][b]CREDITS & PERMISSSIONS[/b][/size][/center]

If you want to use my textures for any of your mods, just be sure to credit me and add a link to this page! Thank you.

urgarulga - preparing high resolution mesh, baking, texturing and converting


[center][b]HAVE FUN[/b][/center]
author: urgarulga
